verbs.description: [ARG1: small plane] [V: crashes] [ARGM-TMP: after takeoff in weld county] a small plane crashed shortly after takeoff in weld county saturday afternoon the federal aviation administration said shortly before 4 p m a single - engine cessna 120 crashed under unknown circumstances in a field just west of platte valley airpark federal aviation administration platte valley airpark hudson national transportation safety board weld county plane colo weld county sheriffs office hudson colorado weld county sheriff office weld county colorado
